body: Ah, last story is their after story. They’ve been dating secretly, but he finally managed to ask her out on a date. Really liking these type of couple, a gloomy girl and cheerful boy who pulls her out. Romcom couples are usually the other way around.

For the first story, basically that girl, Mitsu, got something like Diarmuid’s mole. The story doesn’t put it as magical power, but the fact is she lose her friends because men who saw her eyes fell in love to her, including her friends’ boyfriend and she got assaulted by random men. Even her own mother asks her to live alone before her second marriage in fear of her new husband falling in love to her daughter. So ever since she had been avoiding seeing people in the eyes. Touya, the boy, got interest of her, and trying to approach her. After a scene where he won’t date any other girl if she doesn’t like it, they start having sex until the time when he said he probably likes her eyes. She told her story and wants to avoid him, but he stayed with her and persisted he won’t accept being rejected when she doesn’t actually hates him. Well, in the end she finally given up on trying to push him away. | This artist’s short haired girl reminds me of Aiya’s girls ^^
Sadly can't understand but it's Illustration is Great I enjoyed it
damn, very hot tankoubon. i love the expressions!
